sentences.english: The eloquence of the President moved all hearts who listened to him.
sentences.chinese: 总统的辩才感动了所有聆听者的心。

sentences.english: The hired orators continued to pour forth their streams of eloquence.
sentences.chinese: 那些雇来的演说家继续滔滔不绝地施展辩才。

sentences.english: Poet is born, but orator is made.
Some politicians are famous for their powers of oratory.
sentences.chinese: 有些政治家以辩才著称。

sentences.english: For vast kalpas I have possessed unobstructed eloquence.
For thee, against my self I'll vow debate.
sentences.chinese: 我为你将展尽辩才反对自己。

sentences.english: In the future will achieve Buddhahood, four eloquences, will be the third first mate newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 未来成佛，得四辩才，是名第三大副报。

sentences.english: And they will achieve all wisdom and obtain wonderful eloquence.
sentences.chinese: 成就一切智慧，获得无边辩才。
他的辩才使得我们哑口无言。

sentences.english: She was renowned for her eloquence and beauty.
sentences.chinese: 她以其辩才和美貌着称。

sentences.english: Your ability to argue is of little avail if the facts are wrong.
sentences.chinese: 如果论据是错的，你的辩才也就没有什么用了。

sentences.english: I admire the oratory of some politicians.
sentences.chinese: 我佩服某些政治家的辩才。
